casebody.data:
Solly MAGDOFF, Appellant, v. WILCOX-GAY CORPORATION, a Michigan corporation, Appellee. No. 14088. United States Court of Appeals Sixth Circuit. Oct. 12, 1960. Kenney, Radom, Rockwell & Mountain, Detroit, Mich., and Arthur J. Homans, l^ew York City, on brief, for appellee.

Before McALLISTER, Chief Judge, and CECIL and O’SULLIVAN, Circuit Judges.

ORDER.

The above cause coming on to be heard upon the transcript of record and the briefs of the parties, and the court being duly advised,

Now, therefore, it is ordered, adjudged and decreed that the order of the District Court be and is hereby affirmed upon the opinion of Judge Kent.
